markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Experienced Leadership (8th)](/Rules.aspx?ID=1770)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 513</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Invested leadership roles in your kingdom now grant a +2 status bonus to kingdom checks associated with their leadership role's key ability.

 At 16th level, this increases to a +3 status bonus.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Experienced Leadership (8th)
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 513</row>

Appendix 2: Kingdoms / Leveling Up your Kingdom
</additional-info>
text: Experienced Leadership (8th) Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 513 Invested leadership roles in your kingdom now grant a +2 status bonus to kingdom checks associated with their leadership role's key ability. At 16th level, this increases to a +3 status bonus.
